title: BUENA PARK STUDIO UPDATED KITCHEN Only Pay Electric! Cats OK
posting_body: Rent Includes:: Garbage, Gas, Heat, Hot Water, Water

This rehabbed studio, one bathroom apartment in Beuna Park features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors throughout, and includes heat, cooking gas, and hot water in the price of rent.
This building is cat friendly, features FOB/wireless key entry, and an on-site laundry facility.
Located close to the Sheridan Red Line, Lake Shore Drive, Jewel Osco, Aldi, and Target.
There are plenty of restaurants, bars, and shops nearby to explore, Wrigleyville, and the lakefront are walking distance.
Call today to schedule a private tour!
Looking for a superior building with quality studios and one bedroom apartments?
Take a look at 4241 Kenmore apartments which boast spacious floor space along with modern kitchens and bathrooms.
All units include heat, water and cooking gas!
Furthermore, this property is steps away from public transportation, CTA Redline, entertainment, health club, grocery store, essential amenities and much more.
